extension.name: First Friend (JomSocial)
extension.description: Automatically add the first JomSocial friend to newly registered users and send the user a friend request with a personal message.

field.name: friendid
field.label: User ID
field.description: The User ID of the user to automatically add as a friend upon registration. Separate multiple IDs with a comma.

field.name: sendpm
field.label: Send Private Message
field.description: Send a private message to new users upon registration.

field.name: pmsubject
field.label: Subject
field.description: Add a subject for the personal message.

field.name: pmmessage
field.default:
Hello {target},

Welcome to %1$s. We are happy to have you as a new member of our community.

It's easy to get started. Here are a few suggestions:

• Create your profile and upload an avatar.
• Connect with other users by sending friend requests.
• Create or join groups and participate in discussions.
• Upload your favorite photos and videos to share.
• Invite others to events you create.

There is so much more to discover on %1$s. See you soon.

Sincerly,
%1$s Team
%2$s
field.label: Your message
field.description: This is the message that will be sent to the user. Use {target} tag to mark the target username. The variable “%1$s” is the site name and “%2$s” is the domain name.
